title: USB-C Pixel Buds: holding volume up for notifications doesn't work when screen is off (Pixel 4a)
content:
Hi,

When I use my usb-c Pixel Buds with my Pixel 4a (Android 11), I can't hold the volume up button to trigger notifications.  If I turn the screen on, this feature works.  If I leave always on display, it'll work until I put it in my pocket (and the screen, of course, turns off).

So basically, if my phone's in my pocket, I have to click the power button before I can get the "read notifications" feature to work.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
